page.title: 17THE QUERNMORE GAMEKEEPER 1
page.content: Steven Ozerkowski is a gamekeeper and he works for the Duke of Westminster. His main job is providing grouse for the shoots.He does this by making sure there is ample water for the grouse and creating a good habitat,like burning heather and putting down enough grit,he does this so that the egg shells are stronger. The most common animals that go after the grouse are stoats,weasels, foxes,rats and the odd bird of prey.He lays traps to catch the animals that go after the grouse.He keeps 8 dogs, 3 labradors,1 spaniel,3 terriers and 1 retriever.Occasionally poachers come round trying to steal the grouse but he has only been threatened once by a poacher.He has a 12 bow shot gun.
